title: Wanted- T206 Joe Doyle NY back varieties
author: nodgrass

posts.post_title: Wanted- T206 Joe Doyle NY back varieties
posts.post_content: I am trying to complete a backs set of T206 Joe Doyle NY.  I will purchase graded or ungraded intact cards from fair to ex condition.  I will consider any back variety as I am also interested in upgrading what I have. Let me know what you've got.  Please send a pm.  Thanks

posts.post_title: T206 Doyle N.Y. w Sov 350 Back for Trade
posts.post_content:
I have the attached Doyle with Sov 350 back.  It is a very rare back for Doyle.  I would be happy to trade it for an upgrade with a common back.  Or a similar condition Doyle with common back plus a few extra T206s that I need for my set.

Email [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if interested

Still looking for T206 Joe Doyle back varieties, especially EPDG, Old Mill, & Tolstoi. Paying well for PSA 2 and 3's and will consider ungraded cards & PSA 1's depending on issues.  I would also being willing to trade PSA 3 & PSA 4 
T206's towards a Doyle. Let me know what you've got.

I have an Old Mill Doyle. Check out the scan, if interested email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url] :)

Chris
Still looking for Joe Doyle in EPDG, Piedmont, Tolstoi backs and looking to upgrade any that I already have. Thanks
